segments.text: I notice the woman is completely absorbed in her task, drying dishes with such focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost funny how she doesn't see the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so clever, trying to get cookies without her noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy is really stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool might tip over, but it's almost comical how focused everyone is on their own tasks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still running, adding to the chaos in a funny way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so absurd, it makes me chuckle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everything turns out okay, but it's entertaining to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
